title: Elon Musk's xAI loses co-founder Igor Babuschkin for venture firm
description: Igor Babuschkin, who helped start xAI in 2023, said in a post on X that he's leaving the artificial intelligence startup to launch his own venture firm.
content:

title: YouTube to begin testing a new AI-powered age verification system in the US
description: YouTube on Wednesday will begin testing a new age-verification system in the U.S. that relies on artificial intelligence to differentiate between adults and minors, based on the kinds of videos that they have been watching.
content:
(AP) - YouTube on Wednesday will begin testing a new age-verification system in the U.S. that relies on artificial intelligence to differentiate between adults and minors, based on the kinds of videos that they have been watching.

title: Meta’s ‘superintelligence’ isn’t here yet. But its AI bets are already paying off
description: If Meta investors had concerns about the company’s huge spending on artificial intelligence infrastructure and talent — and its ambitious “superintelligence” goal — they’re likely to be assuaged by its blockbuster earnings report on Wednesday. The results, as one analyst put it, indicates that “AI is becoming a real revenue driver, not just hype.”
content: New York (CNN) — If Meta investors had concerns about the company’s huge spending on artificial intelligence infrastructure and talent — and its ambitious “superintelligence” goal — they’re likely to be assuaged by its blockbuster earnings report on ... [4273 chars]

title: YouTube will start using AI to guess your age. If it’s wrong, you’ll have to prove it
description: New York (CNN) — YouTube will begin guessing users’ ages using artificial intelligence on Wednesday, as part of an effort to prevent kids from accessing inappropriate content online.
content:
New York (CNN) — YouTube will begin guessing users’ ages using artificial intelligence on Wednesday, as part of an effort to prevent kids from accessing inappropriate content online.
It’s part of a broader push to make social media safer for young pe... [3989 chars]

title: Miffed Musk plans Apple lawsuit
description: Billionaire SpaceX, Tesla and X owner Elon Musk says he plans to sue Apple for not featuring X and its Grok artificial intelligence chatbot app in its top recommended apps in its App Store.
content:

title: Google to spend $9 billion in Oklahoma to expand AI, cloud infrastructure
description: Alphabet's Google said on Wednesday it will spend an additional $9 billion in Oklahoma over the next two years to expand cloud and artificial intelligence infrastructure.
